title: ConnectiCoin
author: ConnectiCoin
content: With all of the noise in the cryptospace lately, we feel it is taking away from the essence of this movement. Connect I Coin is looking for others in the crypto space that just want to connect, build and transact freely. No frills, no shill, no nfts or defi bs. Just crypto frens, nodes, memes and miners.LETS CONNECT! - https://github.com/ConnectiCoin/ConnectiCoin

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: At first glance I thought you're advertising a new social media platform but based on your previous posts, its just another POW altcoin based on BTC/LTC created on 2021.You might want to update your post and at least include the link to your announcement thread instead of just having this vague post about it.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5324147

comments.author: ConnectiCoin
comments.body: it can be. we are young and growing
